comment.body: This _really_ doesn't seem right--I get ~5 peers after about 1 min. Can you reach any/all of the [trackers](https://github.com/HelloZeroNet/ZeroNet/blob/master/src/Config.py#L35)?
@Nekololi: _waitwaitwait_: I missed the 'tor only' part of that, my bad. In that case, I have roughly the same situation.
pretty sure that zeroboard relies on the system time of an external server for putting messages in the correct order.
